channel.title: How to make lan server?
channel.description: How do you make a lan RSPS? I wanna make it lan because 1. i cannot portfoward 2. I dont wanna get a VPS 3. I want my friend to be able to play :) My guess is change the host ip to 192.168.1.1 or something like that I know 127.0.0.1 doesn't work :(

item.title: How to make lan server?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

  1. You can portfoward
  2. You don’t need VPS
  3. Your friend can play

Search: portforwarding with uTorrent
and you should know how to host/use no-ip from there, if not read the sticky about making a server in Server Tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make lan server?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Just a follow a guide, try using google, possibly.

Try and portforward, if not get Utorret.
Open your no-ip, and let your friend use that ip.

After you turn on server, and run utorret, use this site to check if its online -
http://status.blackout-gaming.net/

Read full topic
